## Model importation

```{r echo=TRUE}
model <- read.csv2("generatedDump.csv",dec = ".")
```

## Comparison between Manhattan distance and Cosinus of similarity

```{r echo=TRUE}
plot(model$Cosine,model$Manhattan, pch = 20, main = "Manhattan distance compared\nto Cosine distance",
     ylab = "Manhattan distance", xlab = "Cosinus of similarity")

coloredPlot = 1
for (chatmodel in model$Model) {
  points(model$Cosine[which(model$Model == chatmodel)],
         model$Manhattan[which(model$Model == chatmodel)], 
         pch = 20, col = coloredPlot)
  coloredPlot = coloredPlot + 1
}

legend("topleft",legend = unique(model$Model),col = 1:3, pch = 20)

```
